A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Did the critics even watch the same film? Wasted characters.... snork\, Poe\, Luke.....the whole Finn part of the story was pointless. Should have just cut that. Seemed like they were preoccupied with trying to fit in as many opportunities to introduce new cute animal-like creatures as possible.... which I hate to say....was still the best part of the film. Didn't seem to fit with the previous movie too well either.... lots of building up to.... well.... nothing.
